title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the left Riemann sum

1 point is earned for the approximation

1 point is earned for underestimate with reason

1 20 ∫ 0 20 W(t)dt≈ 1 20 (4.W(0)+5.W(4)+6.W(9)+5.W(15)) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5C26@

= 1 20 ( 4.55.0 + 5.57.1 + 6.61.8 + 5.67.9 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4DB4@

= 1 20 .1215.8 = 60.79 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4202@

This approximation is an underestimate, because a left Riemann sum is used and the function W is strictly increasing.
